description: Contains details of products, including product identifiers, pricing, and attributes.

columns.name: ProductCategoryID
columns.description: Product is a member of this product category. Foreign key to ProductCategory.ProductCategoryID.

columns.name: ProductModelID
columns.description: Product is a member of this product model. Foreign key to ProductModel.ProductModelID.

columns.name: SellStartDate
columns.description: Date the product was available for sale.

columns.name: SellEndDate
columns.description: Date the product was no longer available for sale.

columns.name: rowguid
columns.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

columns.name: ModifiedDate
columns.description: Date and time the record was last updated.
